verses.verse: Then<WH227> Moses<WH4872> and the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> sang<WH7891> this<WH2088> song<WH9598> to the Lord,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> "I will sing<WH7891> to the Lord,<WH3068> for He is highly<WH1342> exalted;<WH1342> The horse<WH5483> and its rider<WH7392> He has hurled<WH9556> into the sea.<WH3220>

"The Lord<WH3050> is my strength<WH5797> and song,<WH2172> And He has become<WH1961> my salvation;<WH3444> This<WH2088> is my God,<WH410> and I will praise<WH9316> Him; My father's God,<WH430> and I will extol<WH7311> Him.
"The Lord<WH3068> is a warrior;<WH4421> The Lord<WH3068> is His name.<WH8034>

"Pharaoh's chariots<WH4818> and his army<WH2428> He has cast<WH3384> into the sea;<WH3220> And the choicest<WH4005> of his officers<WH7991> are drowned<WH2883> in the Red<WH5488> <WH3220> Sea.<WH3220>
"The deeps<WH8415> cover<WH3680> them; They went<WH3381> down<WH3381> into the depths<WH4688> like<WH3644> a stone.<WH68>
"Thy right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> O Lord,<WH3068> is majestic<WH142> in power,<WH3581> Thy right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> O Lord,<WH3068> shatters<WH7492> the enemy.<WH340>

"And in the greatness<WH7230> of Thine excellence<WH1347> Thou dost overthrow<WH2040> those who rise<WH6965> up against Thee; Thou dost send<WH7971> forth Thy burning<WH2740> anger,<WH2740> [and] it consumes<WH398> them as chaff.<WH7179>

"And at the blast<WH7307> of Thy nostrils<WH639> the waters<WH4325> were piled<WH6192> up, The flowing<WH5140> waters<WH5140> stood<WH5324> up like<WH3644> a heap;<WH5067> The deeps<WH8415> were congealed<WH7087> in the heart<WH3820> of the sea.<WH3220>

"The enemy<WH340> said,<WH559> 'I will pursue,<WH7291> I will overtake,<WH5381> I will divide<WH2505> the spoil;<WH7998> My desire<WH5315> shall be gratified<WH4390> against them; I will draw<WH9553> out my sword,<WH2719> my hand<WH3027> shall destroy<WH3423> them.'
"Thou didst blow<WH5398> with Thy wind,<WH7307> the sea<WH3220> covered<WH3680> them; They sank<WH6749> like lead<WH5777> in the mighty<WH117> waters.<WH4325>

"Who<WH4310> is like<WH3644> Thee among the gods,<WH410> O Lord<WH3068>? Who<WH4310> is like<WH3644> Thee, majestic<WH142> in holiness,<WH6944> Awesome<WH3372> in praises,<WH8416> working<WH6213> wonders<WH6382>?
"Thou didst stretch<WH5186> out Thy right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> The earth<WH776> swallowed<WH1104> them.

"In Thy lovingkindness<WH2617> Thou hast led<WH5148> the people<WH5971> whom<WH2098> Thou hast redeemed;<WH1350> In Thy strength<WH5797> Thou hast guided<WH5095> [them] to Thy holy<WH6944> habitation.<WH5116>
"The peoples<WH5971> have heard,<WH8085> they tremble;<WH7264> Anguish<WH2427> has gripped<WH270> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Philistia.<WH6429>

"Then<WH227> the chiefs<WH441> of Edom<WH9000> were dismayed;<WH926> The leaders<WH9012> of Moab,<WH4124> trembling<WH7461> grips<WH270> them; All<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Canaan<WH3667> have melted<WH4127> away.<WH4127>

"Terror<WH367> and dread<WH6343> fall<WH5307> upon them; By the greatness<WH1419> of Thine arm<WH2220> they are motionless<WH1826> as stone;<WH68> Until<WH5704> Thy people<WH5971> pass<WH5674> over,<WH5674> O Lord,<WH3068> Until<WH5704> the people<WH5971> pass<WH5674> over<WH5674> whom<WH2098> Thou hast purchased.<WH7069>

"Thou wilt bring<WH935> them and plant<WH5193> them in the mountain<WH2022> of Thine inheritance,<WH5159> The place,<WH4349> O Lord,<WH3068> which Thou hast made<WH6466> for Thy dwelling,<WH3427> The sanctuary,<WH4720> O Lord,<WH136> which Thy hands<WH3027> have established.<WH3559>
"The Lord<WH3068> shall reign<WH4427> forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5703>"

For the horses<WH5483> of Pharaoh<WH6547> with his chariots<WH7393> and his horsemen<WH6571> went<WH935> into the sea,<WH3220> and the Lord<WH3068> brought<WH7725> back<WH7725> the waters<WH4325> of the sea<WH3220> on them; but the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> walked<WH1980> on dry<WH3004> land<WH3004> through the midst<WH8432> of the sea.<WH3220>

And Miriam<WH4813> the prophetess,<WH5031> Aaron's sister,<WH269> took<WH3947> the timbrel<WH8596> in her hand,<WH3027> and all<WH3605> the women<WH802> went<WH3318> out after<WH310> her with timbrels<WH8596> and with dancing.<WH4246>

And Miriam<WH4813> answered<WH6030> them, "Sing<WH7891> to the Lord,<WH3068> for He is highly<WH1342> exalted;<WH1342> The horse<WH5483> and his rider<WH7392> He has hurled<WH9556> into the sea.<WH3220>"

Then Moses<WH4872> led<WH5265> Israel<WH3478> from the Red<WH5488> <WH3220> Sea,<WH3220> and they went<WH3318> out into the wilderness<WH4057> of Shur;<WH7793> and they went<WH1980> three<WH7969> days<WH3117> in the wilderness<WH4057> and found<WH4672> no<WH3808> water.<WH4325>

And when they came<WH935> to Marah,<WH4785> they could<WH3201> not drink<WH8354> the waters<WH4325> of Marah,<WH4785> for they were bitter;<WH4751> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> it was named<WH7121> <WH8034> Marah.<WH4785>
So the people<WH5971> grumbled<WH9235> at Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> "What<WH4100> shall we drink<WH8354>?"

Then he cried<WH6817> out to the Lord,<WH3068> and the Lord<WH3068> showed<WH3384> him a tree;<WH6086> and he threw<WH7993> [it] into the waters,<WH4325> and the waters<WH4325> became<WH4985> sweet.<WH4985> There<WH8033> He made<WH7760> for them a statute<WH2706> and regulation,<WH4941> and there<WH8033> He tested<WH5254> them.

And He said,<WH559> "If<WH518> you will give<WH8085> earnest<WH8085> heed<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and do<WH6213> what is right<WH3477> in His sight,<WH5869> and give<WH238> ear<WH238> to His commandments,<WH4687> and keep<WH8104> all<WH3605> His statutes,<WH2706> I will put<WH7760> none<WH3605> <WH3808> of the diseases<WH9258> on you which<WH834> I have put<WH7760> on the Egyptians;<WH4714> for I, the Lord,<WH3068> am your healer.<WH7495>"

Then they came<WH935> to Elim<WH362> where<WH8033> there [were] twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> springs<WH9407> of water<WH4325> and seventy<WH7657> date<WH8558> palms,<WH8558> and they camped<WH2583> there<WH8033> beside<WH5921> the waters.<WH4325>
